Uses of Class
com.example.ss7g7.stars.Course

  • Uses of Course in com.example.ss7g7.stars

    Methods in com.example.ss7g7.stars that return Course 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Course StarsDB.getCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
    This method returns the course belonging to a course code Searches the course data linearly and returns the first course with the course code.
    Course StarsDB.getCourseByIndex​(int indexNo)
    This method returns the course that belongs to an index number, searches the course data linearly and returns the first course containing the index number.
    Methods in com.example.ss7g7.stars that return types with arguments of type Course 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Course> StarsDB.getAllCourse()
    This method returns all courses in the database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Course> FileIO.getCourseRecords​(java.lang.String path)
    This method gets all Course objects stored in the courseInfo.ser file
    java.util.ArrayList<Course> FileIO.setCourseRecord​(Course c)
    This method is to store a Course object in the courseInfo.ser file
    java.util.ArrayList<Course> FileIO.updateCourseName​(Course currentCourse, java.lang.String oldCourse)
    This updates the change of course name and retains the old course indexes
    java.util.ArrayList<Course> FileIO.updateCourseRecords​(Course currentCourse, java.lang.String mode)
    This method deletes or updates course records according to the parameter mode.

    boolean Student.willNewCourseClashTimetable​(Course newCourse, Index newIndex)
    This method returns a boolean result if a new course added will clash with the student's timetable
    boolean Student.willSwappedCourseClashTimetable​(Course newCourse, Index newIndex, Course excludeCourse)
    This method returns a boolean result whether swapping a course with another student will clash with the student's timetable.
